entry.title: From The Inside
entry.content:
From The Inside is available to purchase on itch.io or other storefronts.

Ten tales of trans lesbian goodness. These stories cover a variety of topics and styles, at times funny, at other times emotional and intimate. With plenty of spice to go around.

Content warnings: anal training, bathroom control, chem play, consensual non-consent, corruption, demons, dollification, eldritch horrors, overcoming dysphoria, oviposition, petplay, sacrilege, tentacle sex, and violent consensual sex.

The Best Dog In the Universe - As the last human in the universe, she has one job: to be the best puppygirl she can be. And if that includes breeding with aliens? All the better.

Ex Inferis - Why do the usual and summon a succubus for some fun times, when you can summon a baphomet instead? They’re spicy to the touch and taste.

The Professor - Pining for that brilliant professor she can't stop thinking about. First thing's first, she's got to dial back that libido by fucking around a bit.

The Lady Of The House - When the investigator first discovers a house full of obedient women, she knew it must be a cult. Only, she can't seem to find the will to leave. And why does it feel so good to obey?

Doing My Part For The Pack - Humans have damaged other lifeforms for far too long, and it's time to give back. The best way to make reparations is to help those other lifeforms repopulate.

From The Inside - Feeling dysphoria during sex is never a good time, but through love and patience, a couple can find a way through.

Cat Got Her Tongue - Any mistress worth her salt knows how to take care of her catgirl, and a good catgirl knows how to be a submissive kitten.

Thorns In Her Side - A journey through religious thought as a stranger corrupts the mind of a monk, until the monk learns a deep secret about herself.

By Ancient Hands - Feeling left behind, a girl finds the perfect top to train her for anal play. What she then realises is far darker than she expected.

To Heal The Mind - A woman at her wit's end finds a special connection with a psychiatrist, who is all too happy to show her the depths of what is possible with total obedience.

First edition published January 2025 by Transistance Press – Avoca Beach, NSW, Darkinjung Country, Australia.

Ebook ISBN:978-0-646-70938-3
Paperback ISBN:978-1-7638637-0-5
